content.html: Ok I have to say this as someone who still codes, by hand, everyday. Using terms like "brittle for no good reason" to justify tight deadlines and/or not doing regression testing makes you sound like you don't know anything about Software Engineering
content.value:
Ok I have to say this as someone who still codes, by hand, everyday.

Using terms like "brittle for no good reason" to justify tight deadlines and/or not doing regression testing makes you sound like you don't know anything about Software Engineering
